title: Calories in 8 oz Salmon
meta_description: Discover calories in 8oz salmon, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Cooked (grilled or baked) farmed Atlantic salmon fillet, skinless, no added oil or seasonings; 8 oz â‰ˆ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by salmon type (farmed vs. wild), cooking method, portion size, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 8 oz of cooked salmon offers ~468 kcal and ~50 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil for cooking per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz cooked salmon?
faqs.a: Approximately 468 kcal for 8 oz (227 g) cooked farmed salmon.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz salmon?

faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain cooked salmon.
Farmed has more fat and calories (~206 kcal/100g); wild is leaner (~182 kcal/100g).

faqs.q: How does cooking affect salmon calories?
faqs.a: Dry heat cooking like grilling slightly concentrates nutrients; oily methods add calories.
